title: Is it just me or does ATEEZ's Wooyoung look a tad bit like BTS's Jimin? - Quora

response.answer_text: No its not just you who thinks so they do look a bit similar to each other even google has some pics in which they are shown to look similar ….sometimes many k-pop idols look similar to each other and people have said jimin looks similar to many idols. some even say he is time traveller as he looked like a person who lived in the past and now thats creepy. Anyway here is pic of jimin and wooyoung.

No, not just you. When I first saw ATEEZ covering BST in their MAMA performance, I immediately thought that the person on the front looked very similar to Jimin. Over time though, once I got to know the group better I never once thought again that Woo and Jimin are similar looking. They both look very different to me now. It was interesting to know that Woo's role model is Jimin :D
